[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 131,154,176,199,219] [Function name validation] Function names are hardcoded strings - can typos or version mismatches cause silent transaction failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 61-82] [Module chunking] When a single module is split across multiple chunks, are chunk boundaries preserved correctly to allow reassembly without corruption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Line 79] [Index tracking] code_indices.push(idx as u16) tracks module index - if chunks are submitted out of order, can indices become misaligned? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 45-47] [Metadata splitting] Metadata is split with last chunk handled specially - can this cause metadata corruption if last chunk is lost or reordered? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Staging area limits] Is there a limit on staging area size on-chain, or can an attacker fill it with chunks to prevent other users from deploying? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Staging area lifetime] How long do chunks remain in staging area - can old chunks from abandoned deployments interfere with new deployments? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 211-223] [Cleanup necessity] Is cleanup_staging_area mandatory after publish, or can staging area leaks accumulate over time? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Line 109] [Sequential execution] The returned vector assumes sequential execution - what happens if transactions are executed out of order due to network delays? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 50-55 vs 86-106] [Metadata-first requirement] Are metadata chunks required to execute before code chunks, or can code chunks execute first causing staging errors? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Sequence number gaps] If some staging transactions fail and others succeed, can sequence number gaps cause the deployment to become stuck? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Line 60] [Empty module code] Can individual modules in package_code be empty byte vectors, causing empty chunks to be staged? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Line 114] [Chunk boundary] Can chunk_size be larger than the entire data, resulting in a single chunk that bypasses multi-transaction logic? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 36-43] [Type confusion] Can metadata and code parameters be swapped, causing metadata to be interpreted as code and vice versa? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 99-105] [Upgrade validation] For ObjectUpgrade, is there validation that the new code is compatible with existing object state and doesn't break invariants? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Version mismatch] If the on-chain large_packages module is upgraded with new function signatures, can old clients using this code cause transaction failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Transaction spam] Can an attacker spam the mempool with fake chunk transactions to prevent legitimate large package deployments? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 50-55] [Front-running] Can an attacker observe chunk staging transactions in mempool and front-run the final publish to steal the package deployment? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 28-34] [Mainnet/testnet confusion] If a transaction constructed for testnet is accidentally broadcast to mainnet, can it execute with wrong module address causing fund loss? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 134-136] [BCS format mismatch] Can mismatched BCS encoding between client and on-chain VM cause chunks to deserialize incorrectly? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Overall] [Signer validation] This Rust code doesn't validate signer - is signer validation deferred to on-chain, and can it be bypassed? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/chunked_publish.rs] [Lines 87-92] [Account deployment authorization] Can any account deploy code to any other account using AccountDeploy, or is authorization enforced on-chain? (Critical)
